title: I need to get a new jungler in my roster.
body:
Currently I mainly jungle volibear and udyr. in a pinch I run nautilus if the comp calls for it.

I have been considering shen and poppy. 

any recommendations?

as a jungler I like playing farm heavy utility based champs, but I could be persuaded otherwise...

I just don't know who is worth it to sink time into learning properly.

also I need ADC suggestions, but that is just an add on... I am a filthy Corki main and want to become less filthy ...

also as an avid udyr player... my champion cancer levels are a bit too high...

help?
